title: Data Detox Kit: Homepage
author: Tactical Tech
description: The Data Detox Kit: everyday steps you can take to control your digital privacy, security, and wellbeing in ways that feel right to you.
cleaned_text: Take control of your digital [privacy](/en/privacy), [security](/en/security), and [wellbeing](/en/wellbeing), learn about tackling [misinformation](/en/misinformation), control your [health data](/en/health), find resources for [youth and App Centre](/en/alternative-app-centre) and [workshop materials](/en/workshops). [Meet our partners](/en/partnerships) to get a glimpse into the global impact of the Data Detox Kit. Too Good to Be True Shining a Light on Online Scams In this Data Detox, you'll learn about some of the most common internet-enabled scams, as well as practical tips to avoid them that you can share with your friends and family.
